amendment.description: Amendment adds provisions to the bill prohibiting funds from being available to any person or entity that has been convicted of violating the Buy American Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to add provisions to the bill prohibiting funds from being available to any person or entity that has been convicted of violating the Buy American Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
